<template>
  <TodoHeader/>
  <TodoInput/>
  <TodoList/>
  <TodoFooter/>
</template>

<script>
// import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld.vue'
import TodoHeader from './components/common/TodoHeader.vue'
import TodoFooter from './components/common/TodoFooter.vue'
import TodoInput from './components/todo-core/TodoInput.vue'
import TodoList from './components/todo-core/TodoList.vue'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    'TodoHeader' : TodoHeader,
    'TodoFooter' : TodoFooter,
    'TodoInput' : TodoInput,
    'TodoList' : TodoList
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
body {
  text-align: center;
  background-color: #F6F6F8;
}
input {
  border-style: groove;
  width: 200px;
}
button {
  border-style: groove;
}
</style>
